title: Top ICE Contractor Geo Erases All ‘Trump Trade’ Stock Gains
description: Shares of private prison operator Geo Group have erased a once-hefty gain that came after President Donald Trump’s election victory, as growing backlash over the administration’s immigration policy clouds the company’s prospects.
content: Shares of private prison operator Geo Group have erased a once-hefty gain that came after President Donald Trump’s election victory, as growing backlash over the administration’s immigration policy clouds the company’s prospects.
